resources.string: My travel time is %1$d hours, %2$d minutes, and %3$d seconds!
Please enter a valid number!\nMust be a positive integer.\nField cannot be empty!

Distance you want to travel: %1$s %2$s 
You are traveling this distance at: %3$s km/h.

Estimated arrival time:
Calculate how long your trip will take based on distance and speed. Give it a try now!
This application is designed to help users calculate travel time based on distance and speed. With a simple interface, users can also easily understand basic physics concepts in a practical way.

Calculation Method: 
1. Enter the distance value 
2. Select the desired distance unit 
3. Enter the speed value 
4. Press the calculate button to see the travel time result
